post.text: THE CHOICE COME THIS NOVEMBER- IS CLEAR!

comment.author: Reanna
comment.text: I am so tired of people un-friending me simply because I am a democrat who stands behind Donald J. Trump! Although there are many positive attributes about this leader, the direct and clear facet is simply put, he is "a man who can get things done!"

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Reanna I am a first time voter,and not Republican or Democrat. He is what we need right now. politicians are the problem doing the same thing over and over again.america is in debt.Trump2016

replies.author: Katan
replies.text: Notice how the parties flipped? Democrat politicians now act like Republicans and visa versa? Total chaos

replies.author: Dane
replies.text: They don't judge you because you're voting republican. They're simply aware of your lack of judgement. Who wants to be friends with someone that has such poor judgement. Good for your friends. I feel pitty for you.
